text: LGBT Health is a bimonthly peer-reviewed academic journal covering healthcare as it relates to LGBT individuals, the only peer-reviewed journal of its kind.https://www.liebertpub.com/loi/lgbt It was established in 2014 and is published by Mary Ann Liebert, Inc. The editor-in-chief is William Byne (Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2017 impact factor of 2.514. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Mary Ann Liebert academic journals Category:Sexology journals Category:Publications established in 2014 Category:Bimonthly journals Category:LGBT-related journals Category:English-language journals Category:LGBT and health care
title: LGBT Health (journal)
